Package hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.controllers.interfaces

Interface BalanceController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BalanceController
public interface BalanceController
Interface for managing user balances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto>
    addMoneyToBalance(Long id, Double amount)
    Adds money to the user's balance.

    getBalance(Long id)
    Retrieves the balance for a specific user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<BalanceDto>>
    getBalancesForUser(Long userId)
    Retrieves all balances associated with a user.

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> getBalance(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves the balance for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the BalanceDto containing the user's balance.

    • insertBalance

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> insertBalance(@RequestBody BalanceDto newBalanceDto, @PathVariable Long userId)
      Inserts a new balance for a user.
      Parameters:
      newBalanceDto - The BalanceDto containing the new balance information.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the BalanceDto of the newly inserted balance.

    • addMoneyToBalance

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> addMoneyToBalance(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable Double amount)
      Adds money to the user's balance.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user's balance.
      amount - The amount to be added.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated BalanceDto.

    • subtractMoneyFromBalance

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> subtractMoneyFromBalance(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable Double amount)
      Subtracts money from the user's balance.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user's balance.
      amount - The amount to be subtracted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated BalanceDto.

    • transferMoneyFromBalance

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> transferMoneyFromBalance(@PathVariable Long balanceFromId, @PathVariable Long balanceToId, @PathVariable Double amount)
      Transfers money from one balance to another.
      Parameters:
      balanceFromId - The ID of the balance to transfer money from.
      balanceToId - The ID of the balance to transfer money to.
      amount - The amount to transfer.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated BalanceDto.

    • getBalancesForUser

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<BalanceDto>> getBalancesForUser(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieves all balances associated with a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of BalanceDto objects.
